name: Neo Technical System
overview: Neo Technical System Co., Ltd. operates in the metal cutting and processing field in South Korea. It provides various micro bit products, including end mill, a consumable tool that grinds the cut end of the slot of the printed circuit board (PCB) used to BOC among integrated circuit (IC) substrates; router bit, a consumable tool to cut the end of the slot hole of the hard PCB; and micro drill bit, a consumable tool to process the hole to connect the circuit to the attached part of IC chip. The company also offers whirling and rolling type shafts; wiper shafts, sun-roof shafts, and auto gate shafts; and worm shafts and garage lead screws. In addition, it provides various direct current (DC) motors comprising geared motors, gate geared motors, generators, hydranic motors, and standard DC motors. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Anseong, South Korea.

milestones.description: Neo Technical System Co Ltd acquires a minority stake in R-Tron Inc.
milestones.source_description: Neo Technical System Co Ltd acquires a minority stake in R-Tron Inc
